selected_quotes: Advertisers are partly to blame for women being underrepresented in areas like science. Here's what they should do
Advertising is often based on gender stereotypes but research shows this is not popular with consumers.
Advertisers that still draw on old gender stereotypes are falling behind. It's about time too
Men are becoming less stereotyped in advertising. But the same can't be said for women #IWD2017
Research shows that non-traditional men sell well – advertisers need to catch up for the -

citation.abstract: Advertisers are partly to blame for women being underrepresented in traditionally male domains such as science.
citation.title: Research shows that non-traditional men sell well –  advertisers need to catch up for the sake of equality
